EmailTemplate.name: Vetting Response
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for reaching out to YETI!
YETI is proud to offer a new and exciting opportunity for corporate customers. We have a bulk discount structure that will offer on in-stock items to qualifying organizations for corporate or client gifting. If you are interested in the program, please reply directly to this email with more details about your business and what you are looking for. Please include the Rambler/Tundra size, color, and quantity you are looking to purchase. I look forward to hearing from you!
Thanks,
{!User.CommunityNickname} Business Development Team YETI 512.402.5895 corporatesales@yeti.com yeti.com
